title: Should we have a way to automatically adjust prices based on exchange rate?
body:
> by 0x739eb7914cd124d049d999c6f1874914af4f5337 (SinKillerJ#5337)

With the recent spike in the exchange rate of MANA many reasonably priced items are now absurd. Rather than having to manually adjust these prices, what if a seller could simply say "always target the equivalent of $5 USD". Obviously this would be an opt-in system as not everyone would want to, but it would help prevent this situation from happening again.

- Yes
- No
- Invalid question/options
